snippet.title: The Elephant Collection - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
WISHLIST NOW: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2274110/The_Elephant_Collection/

The Elephant Collection remasters ten of jmtb02’s classic blue elephant games into one mammoth-sized package. From puzzle platformers to rapid-fire arcade games, this anthology of Armor Games classics is lovingly tied together by an overarching metanarrative and includes This is the Only Level 1, 2, and 3; Achievement Unlocked 1, 2, and 3; Elephant Quest; Obey the Game; Run, Elephant, Run; and Elephant Rave.

The Elephant Collection is a metagame of metagames. (Sorry, we had to!) Blue Elephant’s partner goes missing after a rave gone bad. After awakening in a mysterious place, Blue Elephant must recover his memories by completing and earning achievements in each game That’s right–you can now earn achievements for earning achievements for earning achievements! Complete the memories of each area to move on and unlock all the games in the collection!

Every game in The Elephant Collection has remastered artwork for both original and higher-resolution play. All music and sound effects, originally compressed for the web, are now at a higher bitrate and quality. To give players a more premium experience, we have removed ads in each of the games. We did this because if you played Elephant Rave on a modern computer, it would be a game for ants.
